title: S15 Ep32: Close Encounter of the Fifth Kind with Dr. Steven Greer
itunes:title: Close Encounter of the Fifth Kind with Dr. Steven Greer
description:
Darkness Radio has a Close Encounter of the Fifth Kind with Dr. Steven Greer!

CLOSE ENCOUNTERS OF THE FIFTH KIND is a feature documentary presented by Dr. Steven Greer, the global authority on extraterrestrials who created the worldwide disclosure movement and routinely briefs presidents and heads of state on the ET phenomenon.

UFO’s suddenly grace the covers of the NY Times and Washington Post in the age of “fake news” and #conspiracy memes, how can we make sense of these revelations without losing our grip on reality? Dr. Greer answers these questions for us today.

Visit his site for more info: siriusdisclosure.com

Visit his YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/SDisclosure?fbclid=IwAR2iG2r66Rj4Ad6_u0tu2tYWPnmphomjtJo9EOKlp5ACZzCJlLY8QI0NjgU

Support our sponsors for great deals!

If you’re looking for a fun way to pass the time while engaging your brain and enjoying breathtaking visuals and a gripping story, your answer is Best Fiends. Best Fiends is a casual game anyone can play ! Engage your brain with fun puzzles and collect tons of cute characters! 5-star rated mobile puzzle game, Download FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play !
